title: Avatar Definition Schema
description: Serialized Avatar traits and equipped wearables

JsonVersion.description: Version of avatar definition, in MODEL-REVISION-ADDITION format. Should match schema version

Species.description: Avatar type - currently UMA Race build and generation (ie. UnifiedGenie_gen1)

Outfits.description: List of outfits, first one is what is currently equipped

items.description: A single Outfit, consisting of a list of wearables, one per category
A single Wearable or Equippable (Addressables path)

HairMaterial.description: Name of Hair presets (or parameter settings) container corresponding to a particular material. Overrides default parameters

SkinMaterial.description: Name of Skin presets (or parameter settings) container corresponding to a particular material. Overrides default parameters

EyeMaterial.description: Name of Eye presets (or parameter settings) container corresponding to a particular material. Overrides default parameters

FacialhairMaterial.description: Name of Facial hair presets (or parameter settings) container corresponding to a particular material. Overrides default parameters

EyebrowFlair.description: Name of Eyebrow Flair presets (or parameter settings) container corresponding to a particular material. Overrides default parameters

EyebrowColorPreset.description: Name of Eyebrow Color presets (or parameter settings) container corresponding to a particular material. Overrides default parameters

EyelashFlair.description: Name of Eyelash Flair presets (or parameter settings) container corresponding to a particular material. Overrides default parameters

EyelashColorPreset.description: Name of Eyelash Color presets (or parameter settings) container corresponding to a particular material. Overrides default parameters
